pullrequest.title: Fetch a specific ssh key from portal

content.raw:
Good question: cloudsim_sim_deploy.bash is expected to be called by cloudsim-deploy.bash (which is expected to exist on the simulator instance).
In the case of sasc, for example, cloudsim-deploy.bash calls both cloudsim_sim_deploy.bash and then sasc_deploy.bash.
content.html: Good question: cloudsim_sim_deploy.bash is expected to be called by cloudsim-deploy.bash (which is expected to exist on the simulator instance). In the case of sasc, for example, cloudsim-deploy.bash calls both cloudsim_sim_deploy.bash and then sasc_deploy.bash.
